Class DatabaseHelper3

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelper3
public class DatabaseHelper3 extends Object
The DatabaseHelper3 class is responsible for managing review, feedback, and chat operations in the database. This class handles all review and communication related database interactions.

  • Method Details

    • connectToDatabase

      public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException
      Connects to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • ensureConnected

      public void ensureConnected() throws SQLException
      This method ensures that the database connection is open. If the connection is null or closed, it will attempt to reconnect.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the database connection and statement.

    • insertReview

      public void insertReview(int questionID, int answerID, String reviewerName, String reviewText, Date dateCreated) throws SQLException
      Inserts a new review into the database. If answerID is 0, it means the review is for a question.
      Parameters:
      questionID - The ID of the question
      answerID - The ID of the answer (0 if the review is for a question)
      reviewerName - The name of the reviewer
      reviewText - The text of the review
      dateCreated - The date the review was created
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllReviews

      public List<String[]> getAllReviews() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reviews from the database. Returns an array of String arrays, where each String array contains: [0] = Type (Question or Answer) [1] = ID (Question ID or Answer ID) [2] = Content (Question text or Answer text) [3] = Review text [4] = Reviewer name [5] = Date created
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllReviewsWithIDs

      public List<String[]> getAllReviewsWithIDs() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all reviews from the database with their review IDs included. Returns an array of String arrays, where each String array contains: [0] = Review ID [1] = Type (Question or Answer) [2] = ID (Question ID or Answer ID) [3] = Content (Question text or Answer text) [4] = Review text [5] = Reviewer name [6] = Date created
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getQuestionReviewsWithIDs

      public List<String[]> getQuestionReviewsWithIDs() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all question reviews from the database with their review IDs included. Returns an array of String arrays, where each String array contains: [0] = Review ID [1] = Question ID [2] = Question text [3] = Review text [4] = Reviewer name [5] = Date created
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAnswerReviewsWithIDs

      public List<String[]> getAnswerReviewsWithIDs() throws SQLException
      Retrieves all answer reviews from the database with their review IDs included. Returns an array of String arrays, where each String array contains: [0] = Review ID [1] = Answer ID [2] = Answer text [3] = Review text [4] = Reviewer name [5] = Date created
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • updateReview

      public void updateReview(int reviewID, String newReviewText) throws SQLException

      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review to update
      newReviewText - The new text for the review
      Throws:
      SQLException

      Parameters:

    • isReviewOwner

      public boolean isReviewOwner(int reviewID, String userName) throws SQLException
      Checks if a user is the owner of a specific review.
      Parameters:
      reviewID - The ID of the review
      userName - The username to check
      Returns:
      true if the user is the owner, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException

      questionID - The ID of the question
      Returns:

      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insertFeedbackForReviewer

      public void insertFeedbackForReviewer(String reviewerName, String sender, String message) throws SQLException
      Inserts review feedback for a reviewer by auto-resolving reviewID from reviewer name. Feedback is linked to the most recent review made by that reviewer.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • flagContent

      public void flagContent(String contentType, int contentID, String flaggedBy, String description) throws SQLException
      Flags content for review by instructors or staff.
      Parameters:
      contentType - The type of content being flagged ('Question', 'Answer', or 'Feedback')
      contentID - The ID of the content being flagged
      flaggedBy - The username of the person who flagged the content
      description - Optional description or reason for flagging
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllFlaggedContent

      public List<String[]> getAllFlaggedContent() throws SQLException

      Returns:
      A list of String arrays containing information about flagged content
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • resolveFlaggedContent

      Parameters:
      flagID - The ID of the flagged content
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • searchQuestions

      public List<Question> searchQuestions(String keyword, String filterType, String filterValue) throws SQLException
      Searches for questions with filtering options.
      Parameters:
      keyword - The keyword to search for in question text
      filterType - The type of filter to apply ("All", "Answered", "Unanswered", "Reviewer")
      filterValue - Additional filter value (reviewer username if filterType is "Reviewer")
      Returns:
      A list of questions matching the search criteria
      Throws:
      SQLException

      SQLException
